author: jacopoc
msg: Relaxing default behavior of canonicalization in order to allow mixed and multiple encodings: with this change, in these cases, instead of throwing an error it will simply log a worning message.
This should fix, at least as a temporary solution, the recent issues happening after the upgrade to the new ESAPI.
